query:
UPDATE workspace_settings SET
         auto_invite = jsonb_set(
             jsonb_set(
                 COALESCE(auto_invite, '{}'::jsonb),
                 '{instance_groups}',
                 (SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_agg(elem), '[]'::jsonb) FROM jsonb_array_elements(COALESCE(auto_invite->'instance_groups', '[]'::jsonb)) elem WHERE elem #>> '{}' != $1)
             ),
             '{instance_groups_roles}',
             COALESCE(auto_invite->'instance_groups_roles', '{}'::jsonb) - $1
         )
         WHERE auto_invite->'instance_groups' IS NOT NULL AND auto_invite->'instance_groups' ? $1
